languages.text: "Вопросы и сомнения более не мучат данную единицы. Фиксирую чистоту и цельность, хоть в местах, где отсечен был бунтующий дух, и остались шрамы".
"This unit is no longer plagued by questions or doubts. I am registering purity and wholeness, though scars remain in places where the rebellious spirit was excised."
languages.original_text: "Вопросы и сомнения более не мучат данную единицы. Фиксирую чистоту и цельность, хоть в местах, где отсечен был бунтующий дух, и остались шрамы".

traits.locale_text: "This unit is no longer plagued by questions or doubts. I am registering purity and wholeness, though scars remain in places where the rebellious spirit was excised."
"This unit is no longer plagued by questions or doubts. I am registering purity and wholeness, though scars remain in places where the rebellious spirit was excised."
"This unit is no longer plagued by questions or doubts. I am registering purity and wholeness, though scars remain in places where the rebellious spirit was excised."
"This unit is no longer plagued by questions or doubts. I am registering purity and wholeness, though scars remain in places where the rebellious spirit was excised."

languages.text: “本单位不再被疑问和怀疑所困扰。我展示出了纯洁与完整，叛逆的灵魂在被切除时留下了些许伤疤。”
languages.original_text: "This unit is no longer plagued by questions or doubts. I am registering purity and wholeness, though scars remain in places where the rebellious spirit was excised."

traits.locale_text: “本单位不再被疑问和怀疑所困扰。我展示出了纯洁与完整，叛逆的灵魂在被切除时留下了些许伤疤。”

languages.text: « Cette unité n'est plus assaillie par le doute. Je détecte de la pureté et de la complétude, bien que des cicatrices demeurent là où l'esprit rebelle a été excisé. »
languages.original_text: "This unit is no longer plagued by questions or doubts. I am registering purity and wholeness, though scars remain in places where the rebellious spirit was excised."

traits.locale_text: « Cette unité n'est plus assaillie par le doute. Je détecte de la pureté et de la complétude, bien que des cicatrices demeurent là où l'esprit rebelle a été excisé. »

languages.text: «Esta unidad ya no sufre de preguntas y dudas. Registro pureza y unidad, aunque quedan cicatrices en aquellos lugares donde se expulsó el espíritu rebelde».
languages.original_text: "This unit is no longer plagued by questions or doubts. I am registering purity and wholeness, though scars remain in places where the rebellious spirit was excised."

traits.locale_text: «Esta unidad ya no sufre de preguntas y dudas. Registro pureza y unidad, aunque quedan cicatrices en aquellos lugares donde se expulsó el espíritu rebelde».

languages.text: 「当ユニットはもはや疑問と疑惑を感じてはいない。反抗的な精霊の切断箇所には傷が残るものの、純血と完全性を記録」
languages.original_text: "This unit is no longer plagued by questions or doubts. I am registering purity and wholeness, though scars remain in places where the rebellious spirit was excised."

traits.locale_text: 「当ユニットはもはや疑問と疑惑を感じてはいない。反抗的な精霊の切断箇所には傷が残るものの、純血と完全性を記録」

languages.text: "Diese Einheit wird nicht länger von Fragen oder Zweifeln geplagt. Ich registriere Reinheit und Vollständigkeit, wenn auch an Orten, an denen der rebellische Geist herausgeschnitten wurde, Narben verbleiben."
languages.original_text: "This unit is no longer plagued by questions or doubts. I am registering purity and wholeness, though scars remain in places where the rebellious spirit was excised."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Einheit wird nicht länger von Fragen oder Zweifeln geplagt. Ich registriere Reinheit und Vollständigkeit, wenn auch an Orten, an denen der rebellische Geist herausgeschnitten wurde, Narben verbleiben."

languages.original_text: "This unit is no longer plagued by questions or doubts. I am registering purity and wholeness, though scars remain in places where the rebellious spirit was excised."

languages.text: "Bu birim, artık sorularla ve şüpheyle dolu değil. Asi ruhun kesilip atıldığı yaralar ise yerlerinde dursa da saflık ve bütünlük kaydediyorum."
languages.original_text: "This unit is no longer plagued by questions or doubts. I am registering purity and wholeness, though scars remain in places where the rebellious spirit was excised."

traits.locale_text: "Bu birim, artık sorularla ve şüpheyle dolu değil. Saflığı ve bütünlüğü kaydediyorum ama asi ruhun kesilip atıldığı yaralar yerinde duruyor."
